game.title: The Lost City of Gold
game.objective: Retrieve the Golden Idol from the Lost City
game.description: You've heard tales of a lost city deep in the jungle, where a golden idol is said to be hidden. Retrieve it and bring it back.

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the Lost City
tasks.description: Follow the map to find the hidden entrance.
Beware of deadly traps and puzzles as you make your way through the ancient temple.
Solve the puzzle to reveal the idol's resting place.
